29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

125435.name: Tracks of Destiny
125435.lore: Your victory is secured by countless failures, and the small steps you have taken led you to the turning point of fate.

186254.name: Regret of Infinite Ochema
186254.lore:
No matter how many bodies it steals, its wish remains unfulfilled. Like those who seek the medicines of immortality, it craves an imperishable vessel, one that will rid it of its fear of destruction. And yet, it knows this is a dream that will never come true.

"I have seen countless worlds devoured by The Blemished One's conflagration, and I was one of THEIR flames. I danced at the twirl of THEIR fingers, keenly aware that should the fuel burn out, this fire will also extinguish..."

267806.name: Ascendant Debris
267806.desc: Remains of The Ascended. Can be used for Ascension of Wind characters.
267806.lore:
The Ascended originally intended to bring the world a legacy of kindness, but as the bestowment of Abundance fades, understanding arrives alongside liberation: They were nothing more than a mortal with flesh and blood. Their ability to traverse the skies was nothing but an illusion, and all that remained of their existence was dust and dirt.

"I curse ye, Reignbow Arbiter..."

409960.name: Traveler's Guide
409960.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>20,000</nobr> Character EXP.
409960.lore:
Required reading for world exploration. Press the "Read" button to tune in to an attractive voice in a language you understand, telling you about the legendary encounters of renowned adventurers across different worlds as well as the precious wisdom and knowledge that they have gathered.

"All-new series of the Traveler's Guide, The Chef's Manual to Galactic Cuisine, is now available for purchase."
"For submissions, please connect to synesthesia beacon ERD-23θ to contact an Intelligentsia Guild representative. Method of payment can be arranged to your convenience."

409961.name: Adventure Log
409961.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>5000</nobr> Character EXP.
409961.lore:
A neatly organized collection of educational adventure notes containing countless illustrations and texts entailing adventures from beginning to end, as well as valuable information and survival-related techniques.

"Why not just digitize it and save it on a photolith disk? That'd be much more convenient."
"Advanced technology is far more fragile than you'd think when faced with stellar storms and neuron flow eruptions. Besides, I'm sure the author of this book wanted people to read it in the simplest of ways."

409962.name: Travel Encounters
409962.desc: Experience material for characters. Provides <nobr>1000</nobr> Character EXP.
409962.lore:
A travel diary with messy handwriting and random content. It's not of much use to you.

"Dan Heng, hurry up and finish reading it so you can throw it away."

549504.name: Immortal Scionette
549504.desc: New and young shoot budding from an ancient divine construct. Crude material used for enhancement.
549504.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. Countless years ago, a sovereign's hubris for immortality caused the Xianzhou fleet to sail into the sea of outer space to seek divine recipes.

"We desire to live for endless ages and maintain the empire for all eternity. Unfortunately, human lives have limits and human capacity has its ends. Thus, we send nine Navium Astriger to sail beyond the sky, seeking divine recipes for immortality."

633445.name: Immortal Aeroblossom
633445.desc: New flowers blooming out of an ancient divine construct. Normal material used for enhancement.
633445.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. After endless trials, the fleet seeking the medicine of immortality was able to behold the visage of the celestial being. The divine one cast down its blessings in material form, and the Ambrosial Arbor sprouted its leaves.

"New buds descend into the moon, divine flowers bloom by the clouds. In the blink of a blossom's life, old wood returns to youthful grove."
comeFrom: Abominations of Abundance at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher

635673.name: Shattered Blade
635673.desc: Weapon fragments left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces slightly for Destruction characters.
635673.lore:
This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The master of this weapon rides on a scarlet horse to ignite cities, to take peace from humankind, and to bring down nations akin to anthills.

"The bearer of this brand is tasked with driving peace out of nations."

717386.name: Immortal Lumintwig
717386.desc: Deciduous twigs from an ancient divine construct. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717386.lore:
The source of the Xianzhou long-life species' "Endless Lifespan." The remnants of the Aeon of Abundance's influence. After the Three Sufferings, Xianzhou laid in devastation. The Homo celestinae fell as demons, and catastrophes occurred ceaselessly.

"As decreed by the Ten-Lords Commission, all who are near the mara-struck state will be seized by the infernal judges and cast into the Shackling Prison."
comeFrom: Abominations of Abundance at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher

836259.name: Worldbreaker Blade
836259.desc: Broken weapon left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces significantly for Destruction characters.
836259.lore:
This weapon represents its owner's rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The owner of this weapon makes their appearance at the end of a war to fan the embers to consume the world. Regardless of the glories of the past or the blessing of its deities, this planet is destined to return to the ashes it came from, and to wither away in the depths of the starry sky.

The bearer of this brand is tasked with purifying the world.

920200.name: Lifeless Blade
920200.desc: Weapon remnants left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces moderately for Destruction characters.
920200.lore:
This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The master of this weapon carries a strong hatred for all sentient beings. They relish in the lament of intelligent beings as sweet melodies and topple civilizations with millennia of history in the blink of an eye.

"The bearer of this brand is tasked with stopping breath among the living."

ranks.name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
ranks.descHash:
Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to #1[i]% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at #2[i]% of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

ranks.name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
ranks.descHash: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.

ranks.name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
ranks.descHash:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

ranks.name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
ranks.descHash: When Blade's current HP drops to <nobr>50%</nobr> or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>. Stacks up to <nobr>#2[i]</nobr> time(s).

ranks.name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
ranks.descHash:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
ranks.descHash: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The DMG of the follow-up attack triggered by Blade's Talent additionally increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of his Max HP.

skills.descHash: Deals #1[i]% of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.
skills.name: Shard Sword

skills.descHash:
Consumes HP equal to #1[i]% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by #4[i]%, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for #2[i] turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.
skills.name: Hellscape

skills.descHash:
Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of #1[i]% of his ATK, #2[i]% of his Max HP, and #5[i]% of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of #3[f1]% of his ATK, #4[i]% of his Max HP, and #6[i]% of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.
The tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at #7[i]% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.
skills.name: Death Sentence

skills.descHash:
When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.
When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to #2[i]% of Blade's ATK plus #4[i]% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by #3[i]% of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.
skills.name: Shuhu's Gift

skills.descHash: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.name: Attack

skills.descHash:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes #2[i]% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of his Max HP to all enemies.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.
skills.name: Karma Wind

skills.descHash:
Consumes HP equal to #1[i]% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of #2[i]% of his ATK and #4[i]% of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of #3[i]% of Blade's ATK and #5[i]% of his Max HP to adjacent targets.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.
Forest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.
skills.name: Forest of Swords

embedBonusSkill.descHash: When Blade's current HP is at <nobr>50%</nobr> of Max HP or lower, Incoming Healing increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Vita Infinita

embedBonusSkill.descHash: If Blade hits a Weakness Broken enemy after using Forest of Swords, he will restore HP equal to <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr> of his Max HP plus <nobr>#2[i]</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Neverending Deaths

embedBonusSkill.descHash: DMG dealt by Talent's follow-up attack increases by <nobr>#1[i]%</nobr>.
embedBonusSkill.name: Cyclone of Destruction

voiceItems.title: First Meeting
voiceItems.text: Trailblazer... I don't know you. Consider that a good thing.

voiceItems.title: Greeting
voiceItems.text: Back again...? The fate of those I remember is never a good one.

voiceItems.title: Parting
voiceItems.text: Go. When the mara strikes, you don't want to be next to me.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Name
voiceItems.text: To whittle oneself away, to tear your enemies apart — that is the power of a blade.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Mara-struck
voiceItems.text: We are all mara-stricken in different ways, but my situation is unusual. Although the mara haunts me, memories of it seldom cross my mind, be they of remorse, hatred, fear, or reflection.

voiceItems.title: About Self: Demons
voiceItems.text: When the mara strikes... I become something else.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Stellaron Hunters
voiceItems.text: By banding together, we reach our goals.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Immortality
voiceItems.text: The hope that "this will be the last time" always vanishes in bitter healing of the flesh.

voiceItems.title: Chat: Sacrifice
voiceItems.text: Of five people, three must pay a price... These words are carved into my every wound...

voiceItems.title: Blade's Hobbies
voiceItems.text: Only in the brief moments of its wielding can a blade truly disappear.

voiceItems.title: Blade's Annoyances
voiceItems.text: When will death come for me? My patience is wearing thin.

voiceItems.title: Something to Share
voiceItems.text: There are countless weapons sharper than mine, but after a thousand clashes, what does it matter?

voiceItems.title: Knowledge
voiceItems.text: The dead know no fear.

voiceItems.title: About Kafka
voiceItems.text: The mara's tether is firmly in her grasp. She will not pull upon it before the designated time, but nor shall she relinquish it.

voiceItems.title: About Silver Wolf
voiceItems.text: Within that world she calls a "game," she will never give up, nor yield to death.

voiceItems.title: About Jing Yuan
voiceItems.text: He always... He always understood the price better than any of us, yet he never spoke up — never did anything!

voiceItems.title: About Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Imbibitor Lunae... When will our retribution come? How can our debt be repaid?

voiceItems.title: About Jingliu
voiceItems.text: As she brandished her sword, phantom pain surged through every part of my body... all because of her!

voiceItems.title: Eidolon Activation
voiceItems.text: Life itself is punishment.

voiceItems.title: Character Ascension
voiceItems.text: There is no shortcut to destruction.

voiceItems.title: Max Level Reached
voiceItems.text: ...Tell me this is the end.

voiceItems.title: Trace Activation
voiceItems.text: One of the lesser sufferings I've endured.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Kafka
voiceItems.text: Those who can't bury us, are waiting to be buried, Kafka.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Silver Wolf
voiceItems.text: I don't understand your games and tricks, but suit yourself.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Jingliu
voiceItems.text: Jingliu... witness my every move, my suffering.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Jing Yuan
voiceItems.text: Your new-found enthusiasm is amusing, Jing Yuan.

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng
voiceItems.text: Need me to watch your back?

voiceItems.title: Added to Team With Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae
voiceItems.text: Need me to watch your back?

voiceItems.title: About Sam
voiceItems.text: I live in an eternal purgatory. And Sam — he is good at creating purgatory.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Weakness Break
voiceItems.text: You impede me.

voiceItems.title: Battle Begins: Danger Alert
voiceItems.text: What surprises do you hold?

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 1
voiceItems.text: I will dispatch you by my sword.

voiceItems.title: Turn Begins 2
voiceItems.text: A blade's edge knows no mercy.

voiceItems.title: Turn Idling
voiceItems.text: Waiting drains one's vigor.

voiceItems.title: Enhanced Basic Attack
voiceItems.text: Make good... the loss!

voiceItems.title: Skill 1
voiceItems.text: The fight... is set!

voiceItems.title: Skill 2
voiceItems.text: Your end... approaches!

voiceItems.title: Hit by Light Attack
voiceItems.text: Too little...

voiceItems.title: Hit by Heavy Attack
voiceItems.text: Well timed.

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Activate
voiceItems.text: That paradise may be unreachable for me ...

voiceItems.title: Ultimate: Unleash
voiceItems.text: Savor it in my place... Hmph!

voiceItems.title: Talent
voiceItems.text: A vale... to send you!

voiceItems.title: Downed
voiceItems.text: Is there a chance...?

voiceItems.title: Return to Battle
voiceItems.text: I live? *sigh*

voiceItems.title: Health Recovery
voiceItems.text: Unnecessary.

voiceItems.title: Battle Won
voiceItems.text: This sword needs sharpening.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 1
voiceItems.text: That's all.

voiceItems.title: Treasure Opening 2
voiceItems.text: Hmph.

voiceItems.title: Precious Treasure Opening
voiceItems.text: Take them.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 1
voiceItems.text: Done.

voiceItems.title: Successful Puzzle-Solving 2
voiceItems.text: As expected.

voiceItems.title: Enemy Target Found
voiceItems.text: We can get closer.

voiceItems.title: Returning to Town
voiceItems.text: Are there other matters?

storyItems.title: Character Details
storyItems.text:
A swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade. Birth name unknown.
He pledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.
Blade wields an ancient sword riddled with cracks, just like his body and his mind.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part I
storyItems.text:
The only thing he could sense was a splotch of crimson in his sight and the taste of iron in his mouth. His limbs were unresponsive.
— He must have died.

"Do you remember?"
He opened his mouth, lost, his voice as coarse as a savage beast's.
The sound from his throat stopped abruptly as the cold, hard object penetrated his torso.
Again and again, this repeated for thousands of times.

How marvelous. When his muscle fibers tore open, he could hear the tiny sounds of tendons bridging and reconnecting.
How marvelous. The monster in his body was being nourished, but he would let it grow into a massive beast.
How marvelous. He had already lost all will to live, but his body regenerated without any consideration for his preferences.
How marvelous.

Before the sword pierced his body once more, he grabbed it with his bare hands and slowly stood up.
"Do you remember now?"
He met the woman's blood-red eyes, his mind still empty.
— He was run through by the sword once again.
"Remember the feeling of death, and bring it to them."

Crimson resurfaced in his vision. He stared at the sword that killed him. The blade was broken in half and lying on the ground.
"Rise, and let me kill you once more."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part II
storyItems.text:
The only thing he could sense was a splotch of crimson in his sight and the taste of iron in his mouth. His limbs were unresponsive.
— He must have died.

The black-haired young man shivered violently all over, but still clutched onto the spear in his hands.
He had no dragon horns, and his reaction was slightly less mature than he remembered...
But he would never forget this spear, these eyes, and how cruelty burst out from beneath the mirror-like emerald calmness.
His wounds began to heal. His irises flickered and fixed their gaze at the boy once more.
Without hesitation, the boy made another flourish with the spear...

"That's it."
The one who showed no mercy to enemies - was you.
The one who single-handedly buried the beloved - was you.
The one who almost led the place called home to its destruction - was also you.

He fell down again.
The teen pressed his hand against his own wounds and retreated, until he was no longer in the man's sight.
"Before I witness your death in person, we will meet again, ███."

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part III
storyItems.text:
The only thing he could sense was a splotch of crimson in his sight and the taste of iron in his mouth. His limbs were unresponsive.
— He must have died.

The monster swallowed him again, but this time, his enemy is not another person.
The imposing armor stayed quiet. He was grappled and imprisoned within those pair of arms. The speaker was the woman with sunglasses.

"Listen, I can always kill you again, otherwise I can't bring you back."
Her voice was very gentle, and even the monster inside his body stayed silent to listen to her.
"But I don't want to."
The woman leaned down and whispered in his ear. It was a deal he couldn't refuse.
"What do you people want?"
"Is there anything more satisfying than seeing how the undying die? That's what 'he' said."

The giant armor loosened its arms. "Destiny" was ahead, and he will be leaving with them.
"Listen, Bladie, loosen up."
"Listen, don't think about anything at all." He nodded. The woman walked to his side, smiling. Yet he thought her smile looked very sad.
"Maybe someone left her before they could listen to everything she had to say," he thought.

storyItems.title: Character Story: Part IV
storyItems.text:
He could no longer see anything.

He remembered that, decades ago, he came to the Xianzhou with a merchant vessel and was impressed by the superb craftsmanship of this place.
The young man was obsessed to the point of forgetting to eat or drink, and spent his inspiration like he was running out of time. He forged hundreds of marvels, four of which were the most famous.

The sword named Shard Sword was flawless in its make, its inky body glimmered with a sheen of sanguine. Only the strongest swordmaster on the Xianzhou could demonstrate the true meaning of this blade.
The Foxian girl once loosened three arrows simultaneously with her recurve bow in a dire situation, while still continuing to navigate the starskiff and laughing with the others.
The black-haired man with dragon horns used his water manipulation abilities to rejuvenate his allies, and in the next moment he bound the water upon his spear and used it to run his enemies through.
There was also the boy who kept bickering with him. Yet the moment the youth saw the Devastator Glaive, he grabbed it and never wished to part with it.

Now, ██ had died. His first — and only — death.
However, he was still here, his youth-like brain churning and thinking - thinking for all eternity.
He thought about his hands that were no longer dexterous. The hands that could no longer forge another weapon.
— But none of this mattered to him.
From this moment on, that body will be the one and only "Blade."

name: Blade
descHash: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade. Pledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.
